text: Lainie Kazan ’ s Attorney Speaks Out About Her Arrest Lainie Kazan ‘ s attorney Mark Werksman is speaking out about her arrest. “ Lainie is not a shoplifter. Nor has she ever left a Gelsons store without paying for her groceries, ” Wekrsman told E!
